trans-unit.source: Framework for interacting with Palo Alto Networks devices via API
trans-unit.target: 通过API与Palo Alto Networks设备交互的框架。

trans-unit.source: The Palo Alto Networks Device Framework is a way to interact with Palo Alto Networks devices (including Next-generation Firewalls and Panorama) using the device API that is object oriented and conceptually similar to interaction with the device via the GUI or CLI.
trans-unit.target: Palo Alto Networks 设备框架是一种使用设备 API 与 Palo Alto Networks 设备(包括下一代防火墙和 Panorama)进行交互的方式,该 API 面向对象,在概念上类似于通过 GUI 或 CLI 与设备进行交互。
